title: How to Write Social Media Posts with ChatGPT
description: Generate a week's worth of social media ideas in 10 minutes. Never stare at a blank screen again.
requirements: Some recent job photos to post with

steps.title: Open ChatGPT
steps.description: Go to chat.openai.com and log in (or sign up free).
substeps: Use your email or Google account

steps.title: Tell ChatGPT about your business
steps.description: Give it context so the posts sound right for you.
substeps: 'I run a [TRADE] business called [NAME] in [CITY]. My customers are homeowners who need [SERVICES]. I want to sound friendly and professional, not salesy.'
steps.tip: The more context you give, the better the posts will be.

steps.title: Ask for post ideas
steps.description: Now ask for social media content.
substeps: Type: 'Give me 10 social media post ideas for my business. Mix of tips, behind-the-scenes, and customer-focused content. Keep them short.'
ChatGPT will give you 10 ideas with captions

steps.title: Pick your favorites and tweak
steps.description: Not every idea will be perfect. Pick the best ones.
substeps: Edit them to sound more like you
Ask ChatGPT to rewrite any that aren't quite right
steps.tip: Say 'Make #3 shorter' or 'Make #7 funnier' to get variations.

steps.title: Match posts to your photos
steps.description: Pair each post with a photo from your camera roll.
substeps: Look at your recent job photos
Before/after photos work great with transformation posts
Team photos work with 'meet the crew' posts

successMessage: You just created a week or two of social content in 10 minutes! Schedule them with Buffer or post directly.
proTips: Save prompts that work well so you can reuse them
Ask ChatGPT for seasonal content ideas (spring cleaning, winter prep, etc.)
If a post does well, ask ChatGPT for 5 similar variations
